1370: Gherung moved to Scherbier straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Oda at age 26 in 1370.
Had a son with Oda, Alard, at age 26.
1372: Had a son with Oda, Herman, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Oda, Aghete, at age 29.
1374: Had a daughter with Oda, Lielde, at age 30.
1376: Lost daughter Lielde when Lielde was 3 years old.
1378: Lost his wife Oda while she was giving birth to Woubbrecht in 1378.
Became caretaker of Alard, Herman, Aghete, Woubbrecht at age 35.
